website_summaries.verdict: An updated design featuring improved airflow for sleep apnea sufferers gives this best-selling memory foam CPAP pillow high marks from back, side, and stomach sleepers.
pros: Large size fits all, and also accommodates APAP and BiPAP masks
Foam construction means even stomach sleepers won't have pressure on the face
Provides neck support and helps alleviate neck pain
Users find they sleep better, as they’re not constantly waking up to adjust mask
cons: Some find memory foam too warm on their faces
Pillow has strong odor out of the box which takes a couple of days to dissipate

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is PERFECT for using the C-pap mask
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is PERFECT for using the C-pap mask! I don't wake up anymore to adjust the mask constantly and am getting restful sleep which is the whole point with C-pap. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for side sleepers with CPAP full face or nasal masks.
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow for side sleepers with CPAP full face or nasal masks. The cutouts are in the right location and work great when sleeping on side. Doesn't do anything for back sleepers or those with nasal pillows or prongs, but that still leaves a huge number of people that could really benefit from this pillow. The outer shell/case removes for washing and is the same as the separately sold pillow case. Of all the CPAP stuff I've bought, this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: nunyabisness

customer_reviews.title: The CPAP pillow works very well using the larger cut-outs and allows me to sleep comfortably. I wake up less now that I'm using
customer_reviews.text: I use a Respironics full-face mask. The CPAP pillow works very well using the larger cut-outs and allows me to sleep comfortably. I wake up less now that I'm using the pillow. It is well-made and very comfortable - not too firm. I use a standard pillow case. I have only used it for a couple of weeks but it has made a difference in my sleep pattern. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has made such a difference in sleeping with a mask! No more pressure on my face, no more mask lines on my cheeks, and the mask doesn't move around with my every move. The foam is firm enough In the thickest part of the pillow to support my head and neck, and the carved out areas are perfectly shaped to provide "holes" for the mask. I highly recommend this pillow to side, stomach and back sleepers.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: It Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: This product really works out with my full CPAP mask. I can now turn to my sides during the night and not worry about the mask slipping. It is comfortable too. I mentioned in the shipping quality review that the Seller contacted me to let me know the different design features of the pillow and that one side has firmer neck support. I thought this was very thoughtful of them and a very nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It seems like such a great idea...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone who uses a cpap. It's such a great idea - a pillow with indentations so the cpap mask isn't moved when sleeping on one's side. It should work - it's a well made memory foam pillow with four mask indentations. The thickness of the pillow can be adjusted by turning it around. But the person for whom I bought it just can't get used to it and feels like it still pushes the mask and creates leaks. Maybe the placement of the indentations just doesn't work for everyone? I'm honestly kind of puzzled that it wasn't more effective.
customer_reviews.author: areifenb

customer_reviews.title: Worst Pillow Ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who sleeps with a c-pap and he said it was the worst pillow ever. He kept trying it night after night to see if it would get better, and it never did. Too late to send back so its a waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Happy nights sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time last night and this is the first time in Years I did not wake up once to the sound of air or wetness in my eyes. This is the first CPAP pillow that I have found that really worked. It gave me the neck support the other pillows I have had over the years did not give me.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Butler

customer_reviews.title: No support of head
customer_reviews.text: Typically I only write reviews for something I really like. This is not one of those reviews. While the contour of this pillow was perfect, there was no substance to the memory foam and therefore no support for for your head. When you put your head down it went straight down to the mattress. I was extremely disappointed and returned the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mate Cramer

customer_reviews.title: I was greatly disappointed by this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I was greatly disappointed by this pillow. While the cut outs for the cpap were nice I could not stand sleeping with it because the pillow did little to support my neck even with another pillow underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for side sleepers but makes my head HOT
customer_reviews.text: It solved my air leakage issues about 80% of the time. I know because they come back immediately with a regular pillow. However, you cannot be a toss and turner because the mask has to stay positioned in one of the 4 scalloped holes. HOWEVER it introduced a new problem. The foam reflects heat back and every morning my headgear is soaked and so am I. I know it can be fixed because I have a memory foam mattress with gel that does not cause that. In fact, just my head sweats! Pretty weird and it only started once I got the pillow. For what I paid for this item, that should NOT happen.
customer_reviews.author: fraamus

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have found that these have not shortened my drying time at all. My clothes still have static. And I keep ending up with fewer balls than I put in because they get stuck in sleeves or sheet corners. They do make a satisfying thump in the dryer, and I think they help with static a bit, but I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: and I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this pillow, it just seemed so odd. I decided to give it a try, and I am glad I did. I liked my old pillow, but it just wasn’t comfortable after I started using the CPAP. I found the pillow to be very supportive no matter what position I am sleeping, and it dosen’t interfere with my face mask. It is a little smaller than my old pillow and my pillowcases don’t fit right. I may try the pillowcase that is made for the CPCP pillow, or I probably will just live with the extra size. I am very glad that I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judy G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: It’s very comfortable.  Was good. Not now
customer_reviews.text: It’s tall enough to sleep on your side very comfortably. I was so happy to set my head down on foam that is firm yet very accommodating. I can tell they did a lot of work creating this pillow. Thanks! Update: it’s beat up kinda flat. I’m disappointed with this. I paid more than I ever have for a pillow. There is NO help from the company!
customer_reviews.author: rhoni

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, Peculiar Pillow
customer_reviews.text: As a CPAP user, I've experienced problems with neck discomfort, and with the full-face mask leaking, so I purchased this CPAP pillow. There seems to be one higher side and one lower side. My full-face mask does rest into the carved out pillow curve fairly comfortably, but the neck edge is a forced choice: higher or lower. I wish that part extended down a bit more, so I may try a neck roll pillow to supplement this pillow... This pricey pillow sleeps rather warm, even with the separately purchased pillow case pulled over it. If this improves with practice, I'll plan to update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Northern SW

customer_reviews.title: New use for pillow
customer_reviews.text: New use for pillow. A few months ago I pUrchased one of these for wife and she loves it for use with Cpap mask. I am side sleeper and tend to bury nose in pillow so I bought one for my self, works great. Just had eye surgery and have to wear shield for a few days to protect eye. The pillow works great allowing open area for eye to keep pressure off it. This pillow looks weird but works great. I let mine air out a few days before using the chem smell takes a few days to go away but will, no smell now.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: Not as effective as the other reviewers have written. Was OK on my back, but as a side sleeper did not perform as I had expected. Made my CPAP mask leak.
customer_reviews.author: NC Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for CPAP users sleeping on side.  Memory foam doesn't squash down
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow. I spend 75% of my sleep time on my side. The cutouts in the corners avoid mask leaks. The pillow is thicker on one long side than the other. This allows you to choose which elevation best aligns your neck. The memory foam is firm and doesn't squash down like cheaper memory foam pillows. Has a soft microfiber cover with zipper which you can remove to launder. Four stars because price is too high.
customer_reviews.author: VikingQueen

customer_reviews.title: Best c-pap pillow for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper and this pillow has been a Godsend. Like most c-pap users finding the right pillow is a non-ending challenge. The pillow is sturdy and dense, obvious high quality. The four cutouts are perfect size for me and I suppose most people will find a good sleeping position as a result. I usually place this pillow on top of a regular pillow to keep my neck alignment fairly straight while I'm sleeping and the symmetrical cutout design allows me to change my head position from left to right without having to flip the pillow. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Larkin

customer_reviews.title: It is so much more comfortable than typical pillows and it is heavy enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is a winner. It is so much more comfortable than typical pillows and it is heavy enough to stay in place. Oh yeah, did I forget to mention that the Contour Design is amazingly effective. I have struggled for years and this has been a refreshing deliverance. Now while the market extra pillow cases for their pillows with two contours, I am unaware of a spare pillow case for the four contour pillow. That said, you will likely use either the contours on the thin or the wider side, not both. I think the two contour pillow case will work just fine on either contour setup.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for CPAP Success
customer_reviews.text: I understand it may not be for everyone, but this pillow is exactly what I needed! Since I started using a CPAP about 45 days ago, I really struggled getting comfortable with my pillow situation. Most nights the lack of getting the hose and my head in the right position kept waking me up. This pillow changed that! I I sleep on both my side and back throughout the night and Since using this pillow (about 2 weeks) my CPAP avg usage went from 3.8 hours a night to 6.2. I mostly use a nose pillow mask, but I’ve also slept using the full mask with this pillow and have had success with both. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It you use a CPAP, you NEED this pillow
customer_reviews.text: With my standard pillow, the full face mask moved while I turned from side to side. That always disrupted my sleep. After just one day of use, I knew I found what I needed. I use the large cutout side and my mask never touches the pillow. I cant tell you just how improved my sleep is with this pillow. It was recommeded by the sleep study technican and he was right on target. If you use a full face CPAP, trust me, you'll want to have this pillow. Cheers to a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wondrely

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased Skeptic
customer_reviews.text: As a new CPAP user, I have struggled a little to balance function and comfort. As a side sleeper, my regular pillow often displaces my mask. Although I thought this pillow was a bit pricey, I was desperate to try. I have been pleasantly surprised with what a big difference this pillow has made. The memory foam is still surprisingly supportive and the cut outs allow me to sleep on my side without disturbing mask placement and applying increased strap pressure to my facial skin. Yes, I still think it's overpriced but I do believe it will be long lasting and good sleep is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2-2

customer_reviews.title: Used it wrong😳
customer_reviews.text: I just read the reviews! I feel absolutely stupid😳 I’m thinking that this pillow is so hard and uncomfortable. Well...... I was not using it as intended! I had my head in the middle of the pillow, with my hose laying on the indents😜 I just read from one of the reviews that your head lays on the intent! If anyone would do it wrong, yes it would be me😂 I’ll have to give another review after tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lowden

customer_reviews.title: No more fighting with my pillow at night
customer_reviews.text: Being a side sleeper, every night I would fight with my pillow to get it just right in order to sleep with my cpap marchine. I would fold it, punch it move it around in order to avoid having the mask move creating air leakage. Then if I rolled over in my sleep, I started the process all over again. No more.....At first I tried sleeping on the lower side, but this was too low, so like Goldilocks, I tried the higher side, and it was just right!. Now I just lay down to go to sleep instead of spending 10 minutes trying to beat my pillow into submission so that I could sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow for CPAP side sleeper
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best pillow for CPAP side sleeper. I am a new CPAP user and a side sleeper. It has been so uncomfortable I can't even begin. After reading reviews on this product I decided to give it a go. I am so amazed. I actually was able to sleep last night. First good night in many many many months. Thank you for this product. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Allen R Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Not for stomach sleepers.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this pillow not because of any lack of quality, but because of its advertising. It was advertised as appropriate for stomach sleepers, but it isn't. It is made of good materials and is well designed for back and side sleepers. For me, it was not thick enough to keep my mask from being crushed between my face and mattress while I was resting in a normal position. For a side sleeper, it's worth a try. For a stomach sleeper, look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was struggling with my cpap mask shifting around to much while using regular pillows. This def. did the trick. I must position the pillow so that I am near one edge or the other depending on which side I am sleeping on so that the mask will be in the pocket area. THe pillow itself is cool and comfortable with a good quality pillow case over it. I was leery to spend the money on this, but it is worth it. I am getting a much better nights sleep now that my mask is not shifting around.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic design for CPAP users
customer_reviews.text: My husband received his CPAP last week and I knew he’d need a different kind of pillow. I received the pillow 2 Days after the CPAP. The pillow has been a big help getting him used to sleeping with the breathing device. He was so happy, he said I should try the pillow for comfort. It’s so comfortable and supportive, I’m going to order one for myself. I had rotator cuff surgery a few years ago and to date, this pillow is by far the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aleta j

customer_reviews.title: Gives me a great night’s sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow. It’s very comfortable whether I’m sleeping on my back or on either side. I am tall with broad shoulders, so I appreciate the thicker side offering when lying on my side. I’m sure shorter people will appreciate the thinner side, too. The pillow has plenty of cutouts for various types of CPAP masks, whether the hose is on top of the head or comes out of the face mask itself.
customer_reviews.author: Cachal

customer_reviews.title: VERY firm memory foam + unusual angle for your neck
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The pillow helped right away with my mask staying put while I slept -- almost no air leaks. Two options for height was helpful. Cons: It was way too firm for me -- every other memory foam item I've used has some give to it, and this pillow has almost none. The slope of the pillow, whether the small or large side, caused a great deal of neck pain for me. I tried rolling up a pillowcase and putting it under my neck for support, but that only helped my neck alignment a little bit. Overall, I'm pretty disappointed, given how expensive it was.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn’t sure I was going to like this pillow. The first night felt a little firm. But I decided to give it a try. The second night was much better. So I’m thinking I broke in the pillow with the first night. I have now used this pillow every night. I think it helps with keeping my cpap mask from breaking its seal at night. I am able to sleep on my side for longer during the night. The only modification I made is I use a memory fome pillow under this pillow for improved personal comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Neville

customer_reviews.title: Get this pillow now - don't wait!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pillow for about 3 months now and I am very happy with it. Feels like it's made with high quality memory foam and it's a good weight - not too heavy and not too light in a way that would make it feel cheaply made. It makes sleeping with my CPAP mask and hose much more comfortable than a regular pillow. It is the right height for my head and neck and just feels good to sleep on. It's a little small for a regular pillowcase but I can live with that considering all its other benefits and positive attributes. Would highly recommend this pillow for CPAP users.
customer_reviews.author: RLS

customer_reviews.title: Surpringly COMFORTABLE - and it WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this pillow, I thought it would never work! It seemed to firm and the shape was so weird... But after the first night, I was surprised how comfortable it was - and how it allowed me to sleep on either side without causing my cpap full mask to move and leak. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Helps adjusting to CPAP
customer_reviews.text: The pillow got in time and is exactly as described. I have to say that I'm having a lot of trouble adjusting to the CPAP, and this pillow really makes a difference, I noticed it immediately after the first night of sleep. It really helps to prevent the nose pillow to move, and promotes better sleep, hence making adjusting to the CPAP much easier. It's well thought through and helps the mask stay in place, so there's significant reduction in the times I wake up to put it back in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sleeping with CPAP
customer_reviews.text: For a long-term CPAP user, this pillow is a godsend. The design lets my mask rest much more comfortably on my nose when I'm sleeping on my side. It has allowed me to sleep much better in all positions. My wife has even said that the noise of the CPAP is significantly reduced since I've been using the pillow. I had a Tempurpedic pillow that I loved, but this is much better given that I have to use the CPAP. We'll see how durable it is, but for now, I am very happy I found it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lilly

customer_reviews.title: CPAP pillow was not right for me.
customer_reviews.text: Even the lower part was too thick for my neck and caused stiffness in my neck. I tried it for a week. Will see if anyone else can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne Walter

customer_reviews.title: Finally can use my C-pap without the mask falling off at night!
customer_reviews.text: I spent 6 months of frustration trying to get used to my C-pap. No matter what style of mask I tried, they always rub against the pillow when I rolled to my side at night. I'd wake up with a bad seal alert several times a night. Really, I was at the point of giving up. Out of desperation, I tried this pillow. The cut-outs at the sides really do work! I learned to go to sleep with my face positioned near the cut-outs. When I roll over, the mask stays in place. The pillow is a bit hard and takes some getting used to. After the initial adjustment period, I'm sleeping much more soundly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: COULD NOT TOLERATE CPAP without THIS GEM
customer_reviews.text: On either side of this pillow are 'cutouts' for either a top-fitting or front-fitting CPAP machine. After using a regular pillow, getting face marks, having the mask come off and hose get twisted, this is truly a GODSEND. I don't leave home (travel) without my CPAP Pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Ms A. Dema

customer_reviews.title: Great night's sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was skeptical. The reviews were great, but how fantastic could a pillow be? Well, now I'm sold. I've had the pillow for about a week now, and I've never slept better with my full face mask. The design of the pillow is great. Super comfortable, and creates a great space for my mask when I'm sleeping on my side. Also extremely comfortable when sleeping on my back. Gives great support to my neck in any position. It's not hard, like most "memory foam" pillows. It's firm but soft. If you have a CPAP, you need this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pillow is very hard
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pillow for several weeks now, and am still trying to decide if I am going to keep it. I sleep on my side and use CPAP. I do like the cutouts as I can sleep on my side and maintain a good seal with my mask. Also the pillow has good neck support for either back or side sleeping. The issue is that the pillow is so very hard. I equate it to laying my head down on a concrete block. It is very difficult to get comfortable while falling asleep.
customer_reviews.author: auditqueen

customer_reviews.title: Great for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: This pillow makes wearing my CPAP mask bearable. Before buying this pillow I was about to give up on using the device because I just couldn’t find a way to make the mask work with a regular pillow. I’m still adjusting to the whole experience and have had to continue to fiddle with mask and pillow a bit but I’m getting there. I also find the pillow wonderful to sleep on when I’m not wearing my mask.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Greatly Increases Comfort Sleeping with CPAP Mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! I'm still pretty new to using a CPAP, but I found that my existing pillow created pressure on my CPAP mask, causing significant leaks and interrupting my sleep. I fought every night to get my head in a comfortable position -- until I got the EnduriMed CPAP pillow. I have a full face mask with the hose connecting on top of my head. The mask itself fits so comfortably on the pillow the first time I lay down my head. There is no initial period to find a comfortable position or adjusting my mask's fit or seal. Personally, I find the pillow most comfortable with the optional foam insert removed.
customer_reviews.author: elupson

customer_reviews.title: It functions as intended
customer_reviews.text: I like the pillow. My biggest complaint is that I wasn’t able to purchase this using my HSA yet i found it 2 days later at the CPAP online store and it was HSA eligible. That made no sense to me. I recommend the pillow does well with my CPAP hose and face/nose mask. If you have FSA or HSA check other sites.
customer_reviews.author: tchelle

customer_reviews.title: Unusual looking design, does, in fact, work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I like this pillow. Been using it for about 3 weeks or so. It looked so wacky online but, in fact, there’s been some real successful design thought here by CPAP and BiPAP users. It works for me and my neck is nicely aligned. I have a space for my full face mask when I turn from one side to the other. No pillow interference to my full face mask seal. I have found that pillows are a varied and personal preference thing and I was prepared to do some serious experimenting - luckily, first time outta the gate, this one works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tacoma Highlands

customer_reviews.title: Don't rush to purchase a special pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this within a week of getting a CPAP machine. I don't use it. I had a nasal pillow then which was too noisy so I'm wearing a nasal mask (just covers nose) now. No need for this pillow. There were several indentations to use in figuring out how to use the pillow. Just more hassle than it was worth. And, this is important, I use a very small pillow I can scrunch up how I like it. You can't scrunch this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: bgw3

customer_reviews.title: It is like not having a pillow
customer_reviews.text: No support it is way to soft. It is like not having a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, it's to firm, no support
customer_reviews.text: It's been almost a week I tried this pillow. And it's not that comfortable. I wake up every morning with neck pain. It does not have support. It's to firm. The only thing I like are the cut outs and I don't have any air leaks. But man this is so uncomfortable. Update, so I got a response from the company about my review. Very helpful and I'm satisfied with there customer service. Hoping there will be a better or improved pillow, because I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin torres

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated my nasal pillow mask leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow after getting a new CPAP mask. I switched to a nasal pillow set up with my hose on the top of my head. My old pillow was too fluffy & I was getting a lot of mask leaks. I did some research & selected this pillow. So far so good. It is comfortable and solved the problem with mask leaks. It is an odd looking pillow for sure & is a little smaller than a standard size pillow. It fits in a standard size pillow case. I am glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Joan White

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and no pressure points
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow after using a full face CPAP mask for 2 months. It cause major pressure issues on the side of my nose from my pillow pressing into my mask. After using this pillow for a couple weeks I can say that I have had no pressure issues on my nose since using this pillow. I like that there is also 2 different heights and 2 different sections for your mask. It is also the most comfy pillow that I have ever slept on. I have already recommended this pillow to my brother in law who uses a CPAP as well.
customer_reviews.author: mld18940

customer_reviews.title: Love/hate relationship with this pillow
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using this pillow, I really disliked it. It is large and I have to scooch over to the edge when I lay on my side to make sure that the CPAP mask fits in the Divet. But I am used to it now and I am starting to really like it. It also works pretty good as lumbar support when I am sitting up in bed. I bought an additional cover, but I think now that that was a waste of money because I just put a regular pillowcase on it.
customer_reviews.author: grammyof2

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love how this works for my husband, who has a nasal pillow CPAP. Without this pillow, whenever he would move his head at night, eventually/invariably the mask would slip a little changing the sound immensely (although not the airflow very much), which means I was waking up constantly adjusting the mask for him. Not an issue with these pillows. Hallelujah! This is the second CPAP pillow I've ordered, the first of this brand. It's a little bigger than the other, much closer to a standard pillow size, and therefore fits well into a standard pillow case, without too much excess.
customer_reviews.author: magast

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would not be "tall" enough, I was wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I used to sleep with multiple pillows and when I received this I thought it would be too flat. I was wrong, it aligns my neck so that it is straight and not bending in an awkward way. It works well with my CPAP and I am able to sleep on my back sometimes. My only "complaint" it I wish it were a bit softer, like an inch of squishy memory foam because it is a very firm pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pillow as a gift for my mom. She had been complaining about how hard it was to sleep on regular pillows with her cpap, and with a quick amazon search I found this one! It’s perfect! She said it was exactly what she needed. 100% worth the money! Only word of advice don’t spend $20 on the pillow case, a regular pillow case works just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Nights Sleep
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandfather who truly struggles with getting a good nights sleep with his CPAP machine. He dosent sleep well nor long. I purchased this pillow because i figured it was worth a shot. The first night he slept like a rock. The pillow is dense and has cut outs for the hose of the CPAP. Eveytime I see him he tells me how he is sleeping better witg this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: nicole poole

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this pillow works great for a lot of people
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this pillow works great for a lot of people, but I need my head/upper body elevated quite a bit more than this pillow allows. I do use it on top of my other pillows though. It's VERY comfortable and cool but I just need much more height than this pillow alone gives me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Finally able to sleep with my mask on.
customer_reviews.text: I recently started CPAP and opted for a full mask, not realizing it would be awkward to sleep inn, using my existing pillow. The respiratory therapist suggesting getting one of these. It arrived yesterday and I used it last night. Finally, I was able to get through the night without removing my mask due to discomfort. Thanks to this pillow's design, the CPAP hardware did not prevent me from sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: JK's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Allows mask/nasal pillows to remain in place.
customer_reviews.text: I like the pillow for its proposed use of allowing the hard nasal piece to remain seated correctly on face. It works well for that. Even though it has two levels of neck support, I need a little thicker neck support and will be adding about a inch to the overall back of the pillow to raise it.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Teenie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is horrible! It is SO thick that your head is held up at an uncomfortable angle!! The cutouts for the cpap mask are the best part of the pillow. I should have returned it after the first night but I mistakenly thought it would get softer - it hasn’t. Seriously, don’t make the mistake I made! Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: RobWms

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Pillow works great. Found it to be very comfortable for side and stomach sleeping. The cut outs have reduced the marks left on my face from mask and straps. Cold use a little more thickness for back sleeping, I tend to start out on my back and then sleep side or stomach once I fall asleep but not bad overall. I may slip some extra padding on the bottom of pillow and see how that works. You can use your regular pillow cases too, so makes the wife happier! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Whitmarsh

customer_reviews.title: Way to tall and stiff
customer_reviews.text: This has no give at all and is way to tall to be comfortable. We have had several of these types of pillows and this is by far the worst and didn't cost any less. We returned it and will continue our hunt as the one we had prior is no longer available. Unless you have a really long neck and like VERY firm pillows do not buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: SitaVita

customer_reviews.title: I would order this again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.text: Best sleeping I've had in a while. Using the comfort cushion, but also ordered the cooling cushion just in case. I love it! Sleep back or either side with my bipap mask and sleep mask, without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Best CPAP pillow
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price! It fits me perfectly and I sleep so much better now. The cutouts are perfect for stomach and side sleepers like me and it is high enough for sleeping comfortably. It doesn’t hurt my ears like many dense pillows do and I can add a pillow on top while reading very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Stops cpap mask leaks
customer_reviews.text: Pillow was comfortable from the start and helped me to sleep better. Also the pillow stopped all the leaks from my cpap mask. It allows a space for the mask and when I move in the night the pillow doesn't cause the mask to move and leak.
customer_reviews.author: Jay A. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Might work for U but didn't for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted and tried to get this pillow to work. It may work for some but my mask seal was dismal for the 5 days I tried it. Something about the design skews the mask. I have better luck with my traditional firm foam pillow.
customer_reviews.author: DDSolutions

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard or too soft.  Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great cut outs for my cpap mask so it doesn't get pushed off my face. Helps with mask leaks. Great that it has a higher side and lower side so you don't have to remove foam. regular pillow case works fine on it. Very comfortable and has some give. Not rock hard like other memory foam. Good balance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable  CPAP pillow
customer_reviews.text: I am new to using a CPAP, have tried several different pillows. This is the first cpap pillow I’ve tried. Love this pillow, it suits my situation very well. Am sleeping better and have less neck and shoulder pain.
customer_reviews.author: reggie garner

customer_reviews.title: Had an allergic reaction to something in the pillow. ...
customer_reviews.text: Had an allergic reaction to something in the pillow. I woke up after a couple of hours with my face burning and itching. Apparently I am stuck with the pillow and can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dismuke

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is a bit hard - but makes sleeping with a cpap much much better!
customer_reviews.text: i was getting stiff necks consistently. Bought this pillow, and the stiff necks went away almost completely. The only thing is the pillow is pretty hard with no give, which is a preference thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth or fifth CPAP pillow I've tried over the past few years. It is definitely the most comfortable of them all. I am a side sleeper. The height is just right to keep my neck straight. The cutouts are at the right place to allow my mask to stay in place, less leakage. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: A CPAP sleeper's miracle!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is truly a great product! Finally I can turn on either side when sleeping with my CPAP and not cause leaking problems. For me, personally, the middle of the pillow is just a bit too hard, but that's a personal preference and not an issue with the pillow. If you're a side sleeper and a cpap user, please try this pillow! The manufacturer guarantees it so you have nothing to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Val-El

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this pillow...heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! Love it, love it, love it! I am a stomach sleeper and I haven't had a truly good night's sleep since I started the CPAP. NOW I DO thanks to this pillow!!!! Even my bones don't ache in the morning anymore. Apparently I was sleeping in an unnatural way before I got this pillow. I HIGHLY, HIGHLY recommend this pillow for anyone who has to use a CPAP machine
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a good idea with the mask and hose ... nope. I was wrong. Uncomfortable and more in the way than if you just use a regular pillow. Hated it. Sent it back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron K Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right
customer_reviews.text: This is not nearly high enough or firm enough...does not allow my CPAP to rest without causing a leak....great service and quality but will not work for me and I don’t think I can return it...
customer_reviews.author: Renee M.

customer_reviews.title: Great find for me
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on my stomach with head turned right or left. This pillow supports my neck well, while the corner cut-outs give me the place for my head that doesn't crush my face into the pillow, gives me room for CPAP mask, too. Great find for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable even without a CPAP
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to like this pillow because other foam pillows I have purchased in the past have hurt my neck and were too dense and heavy. But this pillow is the most comfortable pillow I have ever used (even without a CPAP). My neck is hurting much less with the CPAP when using this pillow. It also much softer and lighter than I expected and I plan to take it on my next vacation.
customer_reviews.author: kazzam

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I tried this pillow every which way and made the mistake of thinking I'd get used to it. It's now past my return window and I'm stuck with this overpriced uncomfortable pillow. It's absolutely no better than any old memory foam pillow (for me) and the cutouts don't benefit me whatsoever. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife very happy
customer_reviews.text: Given as a Christmas gift, momma wears a CPAP mask and a conventional pillow was uncomfortable. This helped a lot, and now she sleeps better. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: oldbaritone

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! It makes it possible to sleep on my side with my cpap mask on! Now my mask doesn't dig into my face when I sleep on my side. I love the flexibility of the two sides, too, with the higher and lower ends. I tried so many pillows and am thrilled to have found this one!
customer_reviews.author: Creekside

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this base on reviews. It does not work for me. When I use it I cannot sleep. I wake up with severe neck pain. If I move at all from the starting position it does not help, the mask comes loose and I still wake up with lines all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at first. This pillow literally has ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. This pillow literally has saved my sanity and probably has extended my life. For the last 8 nights I have been able to use my BiPap for at least 7 hrs a night. I have slept through not waking up. Even when I wake up and take the BiPaP off for a few extra winks the pillow works. I still have 14 or more episodes an hour but there are nights I have had only 7. If you are waking up to leaking apnea machines try this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: carol goehring

customer_reviews.title: Works but not great
customer_reviews.text: Although I am sleeping better, this pillow is way too thin after it heats up a little from body heat it squishes flat even more. In comparison to a regular pillow I would say yes this is better but it needs to be thicker. Will be looking for a better solution still.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on good sleep with CPAP
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to purchase a pillow made specifically for use with my CPAP machine. However, either my husband or I were losing sleep every night due to poor positioning of the mask and hose on my regular pillow (which I love!). This pillow instantly delivered a good nights sleep for us both and is extremely comfortable. I have even napped on it instead of my favorite down pillow! I highly recommend investing in this pillow to increase adherence and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sternke

customer_reviews.title: Way too thick, otherwise would love it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it was way too thick and my head stuck up instead of flat. Great idea if it were more streamline/thin. I ended up donating after trying for several nights. I even took out the insert and it did not make a difference. Quality was good. And may work for a much larger person or longer neck. I threw out the wrap or would have returned. None of the reviews said anything about how hugely thick this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: but it is better than a pillow with no cut outs
customer_reviews.text: I am having a hard time adjusting to this pillow, I flip it around about 5 times a night, but it is better than a pillow with no cut outs. I wear a full mask. I am fine with it with the mask on, but I can't lay on it without the mask because of the odor. My bottom sheet also absorbed the odor from the pillow. I was surprised b/c I bought the additional cover and have the covers doubled up. Hopefully the odor will diminish and I can find a comfortable position. Love the concept!
customer_reviews.author: KarenC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works
customer_reviews.text: I am recent to the whole cpap thing, and am looking at any way to make this fit into my life easier. This pillow definitely worked for me - I like to flip around a lot and having the side cut outs definitely keep the mask on my face better. I would recommend this to anyone who has a cpap machine. I do wish it would come in a king size pillow - it is kind of small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found my pillow for the dreamwear mask.
customer_reviews.text: Finally something that does not put pressure on my mask when i sleep on my side. much better than standard cut out sleep apnea pillows, better than My Pillow. I hate hearing my self breath sleeping on my side having this design helps minimize pressure on the dreamwear mask with the hose on top of my head. The side has air going to my nose pillows and if i have pressure on that i can hear my breathing louder. Now i have no excuse to wear my mask.
customer_reviews.author: shannon bank

customer_reviews.title: Best of the ones I tried.
customer_reviews.text: I tried out 3 CPAP Pillows for 3 nights each. The EnduriMed was my top choice. I liked that it had a comfortable non-restricted center position for my head while lying on my back. It also had 2 heights depending on which way you positioned the pillow. I preferred the lower height. It caught my neck perfectly. The 4 tapered cutouts accommodated the mask and hose very well. The other pillows I tried had full cutouts. I would compare it to sliding down a gradual hill versus jumping off a cliff. When I turn to sleep on my side I found that the EnduriMed allowed me to get into a comfortable position.
customer_reviews.author: Naecb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: My fiance is a larger man - so he uses the heighest side of the pillow, but says it could be even higher. That said though, his mask no longer moves around at night, he sleeps very well and doesn't have any neck pain. He says it's an extremely comfortable pillow - well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective! Helped Keep My CPAP/BIPAP Mask on My Face, Increasing My Therapy Time. Now Better-Rested
customer_reviews.text: Excellent CPAP pillow that stabilizes my head while sleeping, preventing me from rolling over onto my mask and yanking it off while unconscious. The effect is to significantly increase my therapy time with my BIPAP machine, similar to a CPAP device, increasing it from roughly 4.5 hours per night to approximately 6.5 hours every time I sleep (8-9 hours total). This leaves me much more energetic and clear-headed, functional and productive, enabling me to be much more successful and efficient during the day in completing my work and social responsibilities. It also leaves me meaningfully less irritable and more happy. Even if the price is somewhat too high, I do highly recommend this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Keller

customer_reviews.title: Only good for side sleep
customer_reviews.text: This pillow would be great if you only sleep on your side. If you move to your back it isn’t comfortable at all and has a small area to put your head.
customer_reviews.author: Douger68

customer_reviews.title: Hubster said it’s too uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he tosses and turns too much to keep the hose where it should be with this pillow. He also said it wasn’t very comfortable. I got rid of it after a month. I have to say my sister used one and loves it
customer_reviews.author: ccm

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps like a baby!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves it!!!! We both sleep with cpaps I bought it for me but I like really soft marshmallow pillows I really love this pillow other than I needed it softer but he loves it and is his the favorite pillow he's ever had!!!!
customer_reviews.author: My dogs mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow with or without a CPAP.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow because it allows me to sleep w/o interfering with my CPAP mask. There are 2 levels too sleep on, one side being taller that the other. The pillow corner cut outs keep side sleeping more comfortable because it is easier to breathe with or w/o the CPAP. The memory foam keeps its shape but, unfortunately does not stay cool.
customer_reviews.author: jane mellen

customer_reviews.title: The gift of sleep
customer_reviews.text: Did not realize how much my previous one had "gone down," but replacing it with the same again gave me a heavenly night's sleep (even with my CPAP). Now I need to replace my husband's, too. So important for good sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Gulfcoaster

customer_reviews.title: Love this Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow for anyone using a CPAC mask. It helps keep the mask from pushing on the pillow so it does not leak. I also do have the mask marks on my face any more when I get up in the morning. I especially like that one side is higher than the other for my neck. The pillow does not have any odor and is very comfortable. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: yogie114

customer_reviews.title: It'll do!
customer_reviews.text: It works well but could use changes. Like rather than all four corners, two corners on one end and a depression in the middle of the other end. And maybe a little bit thicker. Otherwise this is exactly what I needed for my bipap. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LLS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: LOOOOVE this pillow! I was ready to give up on using my CPAP - The seal breaking in the middle of the night was costing me more sleep than it was adding. This fixed the problem right away! I added a very thin pillow under it to get it to the right height for me, but that’s just me. This was a live saver!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: It is reasonably comfortable and supports the positions I tend to sleep in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a little while but, so far, it is way ahead of the first pillow I bought. It is reasonably comfortable and supports the positions I tend to sleep in [stomach and side]. Leakage is up and down so am tracking that to get a feel for how much is pillow and how much is the particular mask I am using - I switch back and forth between a nasal and a full face mask.
customer_reviews.author: Louise H.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know what I was missing.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize a pillow could make such a difference! Especially with a cpap machine. I’ve had neck pain for sometime. Using this pillow the neck pain is gone. I can sleep on my side and feel comfortable. The contours make it more comfortable as well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: EnduriMed CPAP Pillow - Memory Foam Contour Design Reduces Face Mask Pressure & Air Leaks - 2 Head Rests for Max Comfort - Removable Foam Insert to Adjust Thickness - Stomach, Back, Side Sleepers
feature_bullets: RELAX & REST EASY - High quality memory foam creates the best contour pillow design allowing your face and head to rest comfortably whether you sleep on your side, back, or stomach.

PATENTED NEW DESIGN - You Spoke, We Listened! Rotate Our 2nd Generation Pillow For Ultimate Comfort. Our Patented design offers 2 Levels of Thickness & Comfort Means Whether You're Large Or Small, You'll have the perfect night's rest. US Patent Registration No. D856,707
INVEST IN YOUR REST - Restless nights? No more! Wake Up Refreshed, Energized, and Sleep Easier! Other Pillows Wont Cut It!
SLEEP AIRFLOW SUPPORT - One Size Fits All - Large Or Small - Back Sleepers, Side Sleepers, & Stomach Sleepers Will Sleep Better Than Ever!
READY TO USE - This pillow comes ready to use. Forget about constantly stuffing and re-filling your pillow so you can breathe easier. This is one of the sleep supplies you can't go without!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
